Even though my father is the Grim Reaper, I don't know any more about death (or what happens after,specifically)-than YOU do.

He says he just can't explain it.

"It would be like trying to explain the internet to a dog. Or color to a person who's been blind from birth.

It just isn't translatable."

But that makes me think there IS something.Otherwise, there would be nothing to explain.Or not explain.

But whatever it is, I bet it's shitty.
